item.description:
Margo will host this meetup, here's what she had to say about it:

"SATURDAY AUGUST 14th. The BACK PORCH, Old Saybrook, CT.

The Back Porch is a fun Summer place to go! There is a restaurant with good food and great views, a large bar, game room and outdoor patios with VIEWS of the CT River. Live bands outdoors on Weekends and happy hour specials on SAT from 4-6 with half price beer and wine. Did I mention great views yet? !!!

Weather is supposed to be beautiful Sat! The live band is Hardwood.

Address is 142 Ferry Road. Old Saybrook, CT. Their phone is 860-510-0282.
For directions: http://www.backporcho...
It's about 1 mile from I95.

MY (Margo's) cell phone is 203-779-9438. I will be there by 4pm, in the bar area. I will try and wear white pants and white jacket, my photo looks like me except my hair is shorter. Call me if you can't locate us. There is some interest with another singles meetup as well. Hope to see you there!"

For more info on the place visit: http://www.backporcho...
item.name: The Back Porch: Summer Fun Evening
